name: Hive of The Peaks
description:
This is my completed 3D Shooter Project that I have called Hive of The Peaks.

My modifications are:

1. Two unique and complete levels. The main menu was changed as well.

2.  I changed the UI backdrop and buttons.

3. I have three different mixed looped tracks I made using Garageband's loop track options. I arranged each track with a type of beat or multiple types of beats and paired it with piano to try to create soundtracks that had movement but give off a calm feeling for the main menu and first level. The second level has a more panicked feeling to it. I also have a scrapped main menu soundtrack I didn't use because it didn't match the feeling of the other tracks. 

4. I made an icon for my game as well.

Credits

Created by Rachel Tiv with assets from Michigan State University and Garageband.
